entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
